D7.Description: Number of tokens participant specifies will be output by the mine on Day 12.

D7_actual.Description: Actual number of tokens that the gold mine would output on Day 12.

Levels.75: Day 7 output for Comprehension Check 3 (inverse exponential)
Levels.101: Day 7 output for Comprehension Check 4 (inverse exponential)

D12.Description: Number of tokens participant specifies will be output by the mine on Day 12.

D12_actual.Description: Actual number of tokens that the gold mine would output on Day 12.

Decision.Description: Will this mine make more total tokens than the sure-and-steady mine by the 12th turn?

Levels.Yes: Mine is better than sure-and-steady mine (expect to make more than 100 tokens)
Levels.No: Mine is worse than sure-and-steady mine (expect to make less than 100 tokens)
